Package base_SOM_Objects.som_segments

Class SOM_MapNodeSegMgr

java.lang.Object
base_SOM_Objects.som_segments.SOM_MapNodeSegMgr
Direct Known Subclasses:
SOM_MapNodeCategorySegMgr, SOM_MapNodeClassSegMgr
public abstract class SOM_MapNodeSegMgr extends Object
This object will manage a map node's interaction with all of its segments of a particular type There will be one of this object for a particular map node for a particular type of segment
Author:
john

  • Method Details

    • addSegDataFromTrainingEx

      public abstract Float addSegDataFromTrainingEx(Integer[] idxs, Float numEx, String segNameStr, String segDescStr)
      add segment relevant info from passed training example - call from map node, as class information is collected from example calling map node its bmu
      Parameters:
      idxs - idx of class and/or category - idx 0 is always relevant to specific class, idx 1+ is subordinate idxs
      numEx - # of examples to add at class
      segNameStr - string template to use for name of constructed segment
      segDescStr - string template to use for description of constructed segment
      Returns:
      amount added at idxs[0]

    • copySegDataFromBMUMapNode

      public abstract void copySegDataFromBMUMapNode(double dist, TreeMap otrSegIDCounts, String segNameStr, String segDescStr)
      copy segment information to this owning node from passed map node - means this seg mgr's owning node has no bmus
      Parameters:
      dist - dist this node is from ex
      otrSegIDCounts - similar node ex's particular map of segment ids to counts
      segNameStr - string template to use for name of constructed segment
      segDescStr - string template to use for description of constructed segment

    • clearAllSegData

      public abstract void clearAllSegData()
      specific format depending on instancing class - this is called after all nodes are mapped to owning map node
